article_text:
Is Trump the answer?

Posted May. 12, 2016 at 2:01 AM

article_metadata.description: While on the campaign trail, the media has asked various American Trump supporters what they like about him. Some have said "everything" and some have said "the wall." It all boils down to this: They like Donald Trump because he has tapped into the anger and frustrations of most American citizens who are sick and tired of the "status quo" they've had to live with over the last several years of Obama's far left political policies. Many have voiced specifics such as "political correctness,"
